entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as the one who overheard Harry talking in his sleep and knows about Cedric. He is also portrayed as cowardly and whiny.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the one who was talking in his sleep and moaning. He is also shown to be defensive and angry when confronted by Dudley.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as someone that Harry is supposed to have killed in his dream.

entities.name: pillows
entities.description: Pillows are mentioned as something that Dudley thinks Harry should be frightened of.

relationships.description: Harry is shown to have killed Cedric in his dream, as revealed by Dudley's mocking and Harry's defensive reaction.
Dudley overheard Harry talking in his sleep and moaning.
Harry defended himself against Dudley's mocking and accusations.
